page.title: 20WOOTTON YOUTH CLUB
page.content:
{ Wootton Youth Club}is located in the {old primary school}on{New Road}where it has been for the last 13 years. It is open 3 nights a week for 40 weeks in the year. The youngsters average about 18 years of age and pay 10 pence to join. The main activities they enjoy are table tennis, darts, pool, board games, weight training, discos, music and watching T.V. There are also outside activities such as five a side football, cricket,etc. The building is also used by the playgroup, Mother and Baby club, the Cubs and the Scouts and the BRitish legion. The Youth Leader is{Mr. Davies who has been there 6 years.
All the above information has been compiled by the pupils of{3E2, Cowes {High School}and their teachers{Mr. {Williams}and{Mr. McCarthy.
